summary: The package offers end‑to‑end example pipelines for training and evaluating Graph Convolutional Networks and Graph Attention Networks on the OGBN‑Arxiv citation‑graph benchmark. It includes data loading, preprocessing, model construction with DGL‑based layers, configurable training loops, optional label‑reuse and normalization tricks, and a post‑processing Correct‑and‑Smooth step to boost node‑classification accuracy, together with utilities for reproducibility and result visualization.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run reference implementation that helps researchers and developers quickly experiment with state‑of‑the‑art graph neural network techniques on a standard node‑classification benchmark, illustrating performance‑enhancing tricks and serving as a template for building custom GNN solutions.
